00020 bool t_particles::iscurrent()
00021 {
00022     return t_pgrid::getinstance()->current_workspace()->image->current_layer()->grid == grid;
00023 }

00025 t_particles::t_particles(t_grid *g): grid(g)
00026 {
00027     editor= t_pgrid::getinstance()->editor;
00028     nextcomplexphysics= 0;
00029     
00030     #define tsize 64
00031     
00032     u8 bgtex[tsize*tsize];
00033     mkblobu8(bgtex, tsize, 0);
00034     texture= new t_texture(tsize, tsize, 8, bgtex, false);
00035     
00036     #undef tsize
00037 }

00043 
00044 void t_particles::add(t_particle &p)
00045 {
00046     if(editor->dowrap())
00047     {
00048         float w= grid->width*GRIDGRANULARITY, h= grid->height*GRIDGRANULARITY;
00049         while(p.pos.x<0) p.pos.x+= w;
00050         while(p.pos.y<0) p.pos.y+= h;
00051         while(p.pos.x>w) p.pos.x-= w;
00052         while(p.pos.y>h) p.pos.y-= h;
00053     }
00054     else
00055     {
00056         if( p.pos.x<0 || p.pos.y<0 || p.pos.x>=grid->width*GRIDGRANULARITY || p.pos.y>=grid->height*GRIDGRANULARITY )
00057             return;
00058     }
00059     particles.add(p);
00060 }

00062 
00063 void t_particles::complexphysics(float time)
00064 {
00065     quadarray.alloc(particles.size());
00066     
00067     for(int i= particles.size()-1; i>=0; i--)
00068     {
00069         t_particle &p= particles[i];
00070 
00071         vec pos= p.pos;
00072         t_grid::t_interpolated_point pi(grid, pos);
00073         float h0= pi.v0->height + (pi.v1->height-pi.v0->height)*pi.dx;
00074         float h1= pi.v2->height + (pi.v3->height-pi.v2->height)*pi.dx;
00075         float v0= pi.v0->height + (pi.v2->height-pi.v0->height)*pi.dy;
00076         float v1= pi.v1->height + (pi.v3->height-pi.v1->height)*pi.dy;
00077         float yd= h0 - h1;
00078         float xd= v0 - v1;
00079         
00080         vec smod(xd*25, yd*25);
00081         smod.random_deviation(smod.squaredlen()*1.0+0.5);
00082         smod.mul(time*100);
00083         p.speed.add(smod);
00084         
00085         p.speed.mul(1.0-time*2);
00086 
00087         vec mv= p.speed;
00088         mv.x+= pi.lerp(t_gridpoint::IDX_SPEEDMOD_X);
00089         mv.y+= pi.lerp(t_gridpoint::IDX_SPEEDMOD_Y);
00090         mv.mul(time);
00091         
00092         p.height= pi.lerp(t_gridpoint::IDX_HEIGHT);
00093 
00094         if(mv.squaredlen()<1.0) p.speed.mul(1.0-time*10);
00095         else if(mv.squaredlen()<0.75) p.speed.x= p.speed.y= 0;
00096         
00097         p.pos.add(mv);
00098         
00099         //~ quadarray.updatequad(i, p.pos.x, p.pos.y, p.height, 2.0);
00100         
00101         clamp_particle(p);
00102         
00103         pi.add(t_gridpoint::IDX_HEIGHT, 0.000003);
00104         pi.add(t_gridpoint::IDX_SPEEDMOD_X, mv.x*0.006);
00105         pi.add(t_gridpoint::IDX_SPEEDMOD_Y, mv.y*0.006);
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 void t_particles::phys_tick(float time)
00110 {
00111     //~ complexphysics(time); return;
00112     
00113     const float cptime= 1.0/20;
00114     nextcomplexphysics-= time;
00115     if( nextcomplexphysics<=0 )
00116     {
00117         complexphysics(cptime);
00118         nextcomplexphysics+= cptime;
00119     }
00120 }

00122 void t_particles::renderquads()
00123 {
00124     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00125     const float sz= 8.0;
00126     for(int i= 0; i<particles.size(); i++)
00127     {
00128         t_particle &p= particles[i];
00129         
00130         vec pos= p.pos;
00131         float height= p.height;
00132         //~ t_grid::t_interpolated_point pt(grid, pos);
00133         //~ float h= pt.lerp(t_gridpoint::IDX_HEIGHT);
00134         
00135         glTexCoord2f(0,0);      glVertex3f(pos.x-sz, pos.y-sz, height);
00136         glTexCoord2f(1,0);      glVertex3f(pos.x+sz, pos.y-sz, height);
00137         glTexCoord2f(1,1);      glVertex3f(pos.x+sz, pos.y+sz, height);
00138         glTexCoord2f(0,1);      glVertex3f(pos.x-sz, pos.y+sz, height);
00139     }
00140     glEnd();
00141 }
00142 
00143 void t_particles::updatearrays()
00144 {
00145     quadarray.alloc(particles.size());
00146     
00147     const float sz= 8.0;
00148     for(int i= 0; i<particles.size(); i++)
00149     {
00150         t_particle &p= particles[i];
00151         
00152         quadarray.updatequad(i, p.pos.x, p.pos.y, p.height, sz);
00153     }
00154     
00155     quadarray.nquads= particles.size();
00156 }
00157 
00158 void t_particles::renderarrays()
00159 {
00160     
00161     quadarray.draw();
00162 }

00164 
00165 void t_particles::render(float x, float y, float w, float h)
00166 {
00167     if(!editor->showparticles())
00168         return;
00169         
00170     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00171     glMatrixMode(GL_TEXTURE);
00172     glLoadIdentity();
00173     texture->bind();
00174     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_COLOR, GL_ONE);
00175     glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00176       //~ glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00177     glColor4f(.75, .33, .1, 0.25);
00178     if(rendermode==0) renderquads(); else renderarrays();
00179 }

00184 void t_particles::keyboard_event(SDL_KeyboardEvent &evt)
00185 {
00186     if(!iscurrent()) return;
00187     if(evt.state==SDL_PRESSED) switch(evt.keysym.sym)
00188     {
00189         case 'q':
00190             rendermode++, rendermode%= 2,
00191             updatearrays();
00192             printf("particle render mode: %s\n", rendermode? "quad arrays": "quads");
00193             break;
00194         case 'r':
00195             particles.setsize_fast(0);
00196             for(int i= 0; i<10000; i++)
00197             {
00198                 vec pos(rnd()*grid->width*GRIDGRANULARITY, rnd()*grid->height*GRIDGRANULARITY), spd(0, 0);
00199                 t_particle p= { pos, 0, spd };
00200                 particles.add(p);
00201             }
00202             break;
00203     }
00204 }

00207 void t_particles::t_quadarray::reset(int maxsize)
00208 {
00209     alloc(maxsize);
00210     nquads= 0;
00211 }
00212 
00213 void t_particles::t_quadarray::alloc(int maxsize)
00214 {
00215     if(maxsize>arraysize)
00216     {
00217         texcoords= (vec*)realloc(texcoords, maxsize*sizeof(vec)*4);
00218         verts= (vert3*)realloc(verts, maxsize*sizeof(vert3)*4);
00219         arraysize= maxsize;
00220     }
00221 }
00222 
00223 void t_particles::t_quadarray::updatequad(int idx, float x, float y, float z, float sz)
00224 {
00225     vec *t= &texcoords[idx*4];
00226     vert3 *v= &verts[idx*4];
00227     
00228     t[0].x= 0; t[0].y= 0;
00229     t[1].x= 1; t[1].y= 0;
00230     t[2].x= 1; t[2].y= 1;
00231     t[3].x= 0; t[3].y= 1;
00232     
00233     v[0].x= x-sz; v[0].y= y-sz; v[0].z= z;
00234     v[1].x= x+sz; v[1].y= y-sz; v[1].z= z;
00235     v[2].x= x+sz; v[2].y= y+sz; v[2].z= z;
00236     v[3].x= x-sz; v[3].y= y+sz; v[3].z= z;
00237 }
00238 
00239 void t_particles::t_quadarray::addquad(float x, float y, float z, float sz)
00240 {
00241     updatequad(nquads, x, y, z, sz);
00242     nquads++;
00243 }
00244 
00245 void t_particles::t_quadarray::draw()
00246 {
00247     glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00248     glEnableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
00249     
00250     glVertexPointer(3, GL_FLOAT, 0, verts);
00251     glTexCoordPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, texcoords);
00252     glDrawArrays(GL_QUADS, 0, nquads*4);
00253     
00254     //~ glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00255     //~ glDisableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
00256 }
